page.title: 02CHILDREN'S INTERESTS
page.content: Individual children in our class enjoy Motorbike Scrambling, BMX Scrambling in a wood behind Scurragh Lane where a track has been made. Dancing and music lessons are quite popular. The music lessons take place at Frenchgate music studios in Richmond. A lot of children enjoy coming into Richmond swimming baths. There are discos in Moulton village hall. Quite a few children like going to Guides or Scouts which are mostly based through Richmond. Also a lot of people like horse riding and many own a horse or pony. Skeeby has a village youth club on Friday nights at 7pm in the village hall.
